description:
11.115 guided
Apply guided filter for edge-preserving smoothing, dehazing and so on.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: guided

options.description: Set the box radius in pixels. Allowed range is 1 to 20. Default is 3.
options.name: radius

options.description: Set regularization parameter (with square). Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.01.
options.name: eps

options.description: Set filter mode. Can be basic or fast. Default is basic.
options.name: mode

options.description: Set subsampling ratio for fast mode. Range is 2 to 64. Default is 4. No subsampling occurs in basic mode.
options.name: sub

options.description: Set guidance mode. Can be off or on. Default is off. If off, single input is required. If on, two inputs of the same resolution and pixel format are required. The second input serves as the guidance.
options.name: guidance

options.description: Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
options.name: planes
